REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2292 reute d f BC-E-TRON-NAMES-DIRECTOR 04-07 0053

TEXT.TITLE: E-TRON NAMES DIRECTOR OF CHAFF DIVISION
TEXT.BODY: <E-tron> said it named Thomas Fleming director of its Chaff Countermeasures Division. Fleming, who has 18 years experience in Chaff manufacturing, was formerly with Tracor Inc <TRR>, the company said. E-Tron said it is currently in Chapter 11. Reuter
